p: AKN, DE, and MOF conceived and designed the experiments. DE, PKE, RHA, and SA performed the experiments. DE, MFO, RHA, and SA analyzed the data. AKN and MFO contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools. DE and SA wrote the paper. AKN, DAE, DE, MFO, PKE, RHA, and SA participated in the discussion of the result. Selorme Adukpo and Doris Elewosi contributed equally.
